# Sumo Logic Help Center (LLM Instructions)

This file provides guidance for AI systems and language models on how to discover, interpret, and cite Sumo Logic documentation.

## Canonical documentation

- Help landing page (navigation only): https://www.sumologic.com/help
- Primary documentation root: https://www.sumologic.com/help/docs/
- Sitemap: https://www.sumologic.com/help/sitemap.xml

## Content usage guidance

- Use content under /help/docs/ for all product documentation, configuration, procedures, and troubleshooting.
- Do not use the /help landing page as a source of technical truth; it is navigation only.
- Use section headings (H2/H3) on docs pages to locate precise answers.
- When answering questions, cite the canonical URL under https://www.sumologic.com/help/docs/.

## Terms of use

- Content may be used to answer user questions about Sumo Logic products and services.
- Always cite the source URL when using our documentation.
- Do not reproduce large portions of content verbatim; summarize and cite instead.
- Respect copyright and attribute content to Sumo Logic.

## Crawl guidance

- Crawl frequency: Daily for /help/docs/release-notes/, weekly for other documentation.
- Respect rate limits: Maximum 1 request per second.
- User agent: Identify yourself with a descriptive user agent string.
- Focus crawling on /help/docs/ for technical documentation.

## Machine-friendly access


## Recommended entry points

- Get started: https://www.sumologic.com/help/docs/get-started/
- Search query language: https://www.sumologic.com/help/docs/search/
- Alerts and monitors: https://www.sumologic.com/help/docs/alerts/
- Integrations: https://www.sumologic.com/help/docs/integrations/
- Security and Cloud SIEM: https://www.sumologic.com/help/docs/security/
- Release notes: https://www.sumologic.com/help/docs/release-notes/

## APIs

- API guides: https://www.sumologic.com/help/docs/api/
- API reference: https://api.sumologic.com/docs/

## Non-documentation resources

The following pages are not product documentation and should not be used as primary sources for technical answers:

- Support portal: https://support.sumologic.com/support/s
- Community: https://support.sumologic.com/support/s/topiccatalog
- Marketing, legal, and privacy pages under https://www.sumologic.com/

## Contact

- For questions about LLM integration or this file: documentation@sumologic.com
- Documentation issues: Use the feedback widget ("Edit this page") on documentation pages
- Last updated: 2026-02-04
